twitch_info.title: Highlight: 320+ Hours of Enhanced Interrogation Techniques

message.body: pb by the way
hello algo
what's up
hi xoryla!
I got a pb
wait what
poggers
maybe like 10 minutes ago
you can check the void
vod
i assume you got through the shower
yes, it was during disgusting arrows
after that speedup thing
even like that wow
ill check it out now
god twitch mobile is so inconvenient
pretty hard to find that honestly BloodTrail
yeah, it's ridiculous
maybe you can just wait until you're back on your pc to look at it
the better way to see it if you redo this right now B)
lets go
LUL
if only
everything can happen
so i hope for more attempts like that
wtf LUL
this also can happen
this is a common problem for everyone on this avoidance
every time i got the death like that i felt kinda frustrated
especially with my lacking consistency during my early grind
positive mental is a must for this game
80% of the diffficulty is mental
only 20% skill Keepo
when i started getting to this purple 1 attack more consistently i became invincible to that feeling due to this death
not invincible
more like invulnerable
thats the word
purple 1 is such a silly name for that attack
this entire avoidance is purple LUL
you know that's destination boss attack
along with yellow 1 which is literally the first attack in this avoidance
oh, I did not know about yellow 1
I recognized the purple
so purple 1 is what they call the destination attack?
k3 desti forced me to learn these attacks names Kappa
well, destination boss consists of yellow, purple, red and blue attacks
and the purple attack is the same pattern as the one on this avoidance
when i first saw this avoidance i was like "wow is that destination 2?????"
and then you found out Keepo
and when i saw other attacks i was like "oh........... ill definitely play it!!"
whose video of this did you see?
the most popular on yt
plynq?
if it's a clear then it's afoth
don't remember actually, it is either afoth or plynq
it's got like 37k views
oh then probably afoth
today just noticed blue has beaten curtain call
oh, interesting
and then i noticed he cleared it in 5 hours :p
idk how u havent gone crazy playing this for so long
i was at my limit 30 hours in lmaoo
gl
sup casual
I think your advice not to play this game was good
but I didn't listen
and now here I am
time sunk fallacy FeelsBadMan
:O
to answer your question, practicing the game is actually pretty cosy, and most of the 320 hours is practice
it's attempts that suck
ah
about 11 hours so far
yeah that wouldnt be that bad then
practice is whatevs
the real runs are what make it unbearable
whats your pb?
from the beginning of the avoidance, it's to the part after the speedup during disgusting arrows
but I have cleared the game starting from after the pattern
~15 seconds in
yeah there is a highlight of that
but of course, even though that's basically the whole thing, no one cares since it's not a real clear LUL
lol thats tragic
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=M2FOiO5ABks
yeah, it's a banger
LMAO
did you add that warp?
I almost have the well-wishes from half of the clearers now
yeah, I made the practice tool
it's got warps for most of the attacks
plus a warp that sends you to a random attack
gotcha

i like practice mods where you spawn and the attack starts but one of my biggest gripes is when there is a game where they add in a bunch of practice warps for attacks but they spawn you at the wrong position to dodge the attack or not how you would do it traditionally. had this issue with soulless and some other bosses
would rather savestate and play the attack how you would actually play it during a run
oh yeah, galaxy collapse has that positioning problem
I make sure my practice warps spawn you in the right place
good man
it's such garbage if they don't
when the game has practice warps for attacks but you cant savestate, its studio, and the positioning is off
ðŸ˜©
LUL
never done studio games
partially because I couldn't decompile until recently
plug it brother
I need to learn the keybindings for savestating as well
it's probably an option in the game global settings I suppose
is the decompiling more involved that gm8
not really
but it requires a special program
other than the usual decompiler
ah ic
the one made for undertale specifically
shoutouts undertale
and then it doesn't really do the full job
like, I'm pretty sure you can really edit the room easily
it just gives you a list of objects and coordinaes
I think there's a fully featured decompiler but it's private????
oic
which is bullshit if true
lmao classic
only We can decompile
yeah, it really is a classic
thats how the gm8 decompiler better version was for a while too
stupid as fuck it leaks eventually
I can believe that
everything gets leaked at some point
even that sy emperor boss LUL
that was prob one of the recent people who got around to the ex shit
yeah, probably
wouldnt be to hard to figure out if someone tried to i bet
but its w/e
I thought you needed to clear emperor specifically?
private games are a meme
nah
true end or emperor
i have it so
yeah, the instant I learned about the existence of privates, I immediately started my archive LUL
can't have some game going private on my without owning it
such trash LUL
it was really annoying back in the day because there were a lot of cool avoidances that were private and it was such a drought for good bosses back then lol
yes, this one was private wasn't it?
at least for a time?
uhhh
dont think so?
of course, it's not a "good" avoidance...
i think he just released it
might be charisma ur thinking of
which triggered me
i wanted to play it
ok, maybe it was just an issue of the dl only being on his nico then
but it was "jp only" tournament
lol
like alright bruh
yeah, I remember seeing those discord messages
there's another jp tournament game that ao has that we'll probably never see
some pattern boss
that's the last private game I can think of that I'd care about acquiring

i dont mind if you make your game private for a good reason and i will respect that and not share if thats the case but if its like, its already been released then you go back and make it hard for people to get or do the classic jp tourney private game meme its annoying
yeah
tournament games being private was always the most annoying for me
since it was like you needed to pay for some stupid nico subscription to even enter these tournies
what, you don't like fangame dungeon? Keepo
and you wouldnt even know they were going on
but the games were good
yeah, if you're not jp, sucks for you I guess
lol i honestly never really cared for those games as much as some of the older tourney games
it was a lot of needle so it was w/e
that's true
I mean, most avoidances these days are not your thing anyways right?
you like a lot of older stuff
and then just play it on higher speed to make it interesting again
yeah mostly, i play some new stuff here and there
you mentioned kardia

i think its just hard for me to get into bosses in general because the difficulty factor isnt really there but i already like these old bosses from a combo of nostalgia and the way they play so i gravitate towards playing them at a faster speed for a new challenge
yeah
i played uhh
i wanna be the sin
thats boss has a lot of bs though i got bored of it when it was gambling for the clear at the end of the grind and didnt bother
its a neat boss still
yeah, ao had some neat strats for it but the bs factor can't be eliminated
bs in general is a problem but I'm not sure how to handle it other than just sitting in a practice tool all day

i think im just picky with whose bosses i like. id say ouka afoth and nenemashi are safe picks where id probably enjoy grinding one of their bosses but even still im picky about which one since it cant have too much bs
yeah that cuts out a lot of bosses, depending on how much is "too much"
all those makers have a lot of standouts
well, maybe except ouka, I'm not sure about him
you said he makes good stuff when it's not hard though
like for ouka id say mushroom mother would be the most bs i can handle. cant do stuff like alien or mustela thats garbo
why doesn't ouka play his own bosses?
he's good enough
ðŸ¤·
i feel like he doesnt care as much about balancing when hes making something made to be super difficult
but he does when its medium/easy difficulty
and those bosses are the ones i really like
meteor rainy ray heimdal etc
tbh it makes sense
interesting
like he didnt test alien and maybe it was because he didnt wanna figure out the best strats for that boss
thats a huge time investment to test that
and make it as fair as possible
but medium easy bosses its nb
I'd think that caring about balance is more important when the boss is harder, but I agree the investment of time is also much higher
still, you're fucking over your players by releasing bosses like that LUL
yeah but for him its a passion project at the end of the day and its still something for people to play
still a net positive in his mind i imagine
oh yeah, no question
for the rest of us, I don't know
is invincible alien net postive on human suffering? LUL
lol
honestly man if you played alien after ouka released it saying it wasnt tested and experienced the bs attacks and kept going thats on you
who did that though?
I'm was not in the community at the time
everyone who cleared it lol
even after it was tested it still wasnt balanced anyways
welp, they're all masochists
it wasnt ever properly tested i think it was more of like patches to attacks that were way too bs
a "video testplay" Keepo
ðŸ’¯
do you think a phase 4+5 clear on last tis would be worthwhile?
I'm considering do that at some point
just cutting out the waiting basically
nah
idk if you enjoy it maybe
but it doesnt sound that fun
well jeez, I really looking for something fun to play after this
sounds like it's going to be hard to find something
I also want it to be more difficult
mm
but at this point maybe it's time to move on from 1.0 speed
eh
i mean maybe it would be fun
i guess i wouldnt see the appeal because id be disappointed clearing the hard part of a boss without the intro but if your goal is just 4 and 5 together youd prob have a different mindset
I mean, how much easier would skipping the first three phases even make it?
for some reason people are saying soulless hard mode is harder than last tis nowadays which is dumb but you could play that
its sorta fun
def harder than this
it's because max suspect it to be the case, that's all. Even he isn't sure
ah ic
I assume that you know better
nah yeah its def not harder
because soulless' attacks are just too easy?
yeah the hardmode attacks even some of them are easier than the original soulless attacks
its not like every attack is buffed out the ass
and its actually fair too
LUL
yeah that helps
the hardest part about last tis is playing 6 mins to get walled then doing it again
its so much more of a mental challenge
being able to turn on your focus at p4
some soulless hm attacks are easier than original ones?
that's interesting
I was saying earlier than DS is mostly a mental challenge, I'd say that it goes 10x for last tis
even sin kun was shocked that you could keep grinding last tis with no breaks
i will correct myself, soulless hm def isnt completely fair, but its way more fair than last tis could ever imagine being
and that helps a ton if you are trying to clear something since you actually have a chance every attempt
ive got mental issues man
no other explanation
ðŸ¤·
that's okay, I probably have some too
sort of like we were talking about, nothing wrong with it if you have something to show for it
sometimes i think back to playing through phase 1 and 2 and im like thank god thats done with lmao
@Algosith a million times easier
its still hard as fuck to get 4+5, i probably only did it like 10 or so times in practice but i wasnt actively shooting for it it just kind happened
yeah, it's easier that way
when you care it adds pressure
id equate it to like having to sprint 200m after running a mile vs having to sprint 200m without doing the mile
that's a good analogy
so true
LUL
ds moment
I still think that's one of the more fair attacks
most of the time you can either hide in the corner or jump over everything
this was my personal meme attack during my grind
I have a tas of ds cut content attacks that show ao was consider making that attack even worse
once I get a decent recording of it I'll post it
ds cut content? holy moly how to find it
commented out in the code
oh then ill be waiting for your post
ao will probably get mad and scrub his games of all the comments after this Keepo
alright i gotta go build a bench with some friends. gl with this cya around
thanks casual, nice talking to you <3
bye, have a good day
you too
recently just found out ao wanted to make this avoidance difficulty similar to super fish
is that true?
I read on his blog that he wanted it to be similar difficulty to regular fish
but he found out that it was much harder
yeah, i probably was reading the same blog
yeah, so it's just regular fish
i thought he was saying it about super fish
let me find that post
that's on his fangame release posts

he released the game and wrote it
but the first sentence is crossed out
so you see it just says regular fish
i thought "fish sister" is super fish
no
that's the case
he means that fish is like a "sister avoidance" to ds
or he thought it was like that, until he realized ds was harder, at least
well tbh it feels like that because of the title screen
yes, exactly
it has a similar design
and the touhou bullets again
no timer on the clear screen though
touhou bullets is a classic moment
im wondering when did fish come out
no
when fish was released
it's old, I'm not sure
more correct way
actually, they are both correct
released is more formal than "came out" but most people will use the informal term
when was fish released? LUL
anyways, probably like 2015
I'm not sure the exact year or date
and ds is 2017
yes
ao surely had a passion to make avoidances like these BloodTrail
fish might be 2014
yeah, ao has put a lot of effort into making fangames
and he also probably made a lot of stuff he didn't release
unfinished stuff
may happen
doubt it
ok i suppose chatting with people kinda distracts you while playing the game
you do 2-3 attempts and then go to chat
it definitely does, but don't worry about distracting me if you're concerned that I care about getting good attempts
I find chatting with you more important
I only stream to talk with you and the other people who drop by
like talking with casual and sin kun was very fun
avoidance clears can always wait, but the people come and go
pretty interesting, i thought this game became super annoying and you want to get rid of it as soon as possible
im wondering how do people find your livestreams
well, I would ideally like to clear today but that won't happen
twitch category?
let me check
because that makes me think about moving from youtube on twitch
60% browsing, 20% searching
according to my channel analytics
and me who came from the notification
yeah, maybe that's grouped under "other"
I'm not sure
well actually that's my fault that I don't have viewers on my stream, i just don't notify my friends about broadcating LUL
im too humble in terms of that
yeah, I get that
I would feel like a bother to them
and, well, it is more pleasant when people visit your stream at their will
sometimes even surprising
yeah, I had no idea that casual would drop by, for instance
or sin kun
like, I don't think you wasn't surprised when sinkun came to watch you
you with casual are good friends, i thought you talk with each other almost every day
If only LUL
we are on good terms
considering what a nice conversation you two had today
but we do not talk that much
except if he streams
I would like to talk more, but he needs to stream more for that to happen LUL
and I need to be awake to catch it
he heard your desire and came by himself
yeah, he's psychic
I don't talk that much with most of the community
by choice
it's mostly just max, since I run the spreadsheet with him, and the folks in the fangame archive server, and whoever comes in here
and then of course I watch casualcrap
that's it
well, also elcochran
but only every sunday when he's on
i constantly talk about fangames with my russian internet friends
and you of course
yeah, that's nice
I'm not so much a fan of fangames in general, is probably part of it
but anyway i want to socialize with foreign fangamers so i sometimes catch some streams and write some messages
that'
that's cool
in order to do so, i signed up for the tournament as well
that's not only pleasant time spending, but also pretty useful
oopsie
you could go under if i saw right
If only there was more time in the day
yeah, I fatfingered an arrow key which stopped my movement
I was holding right on numpad
but then I hit right arrow
so yeah, i wish theyll accept my application
and then bam, my movement stopped
keybind moment
I hope they accept it as well
moreover, I hope you can actually participate at the time the tournament is scheduled for
when will i remember every time i use wish i have to write everything in past tense
I think you should write " i hope they'll accept my application
hope
that's the word
english has some funny past tense stuff involving hypotheticals
like if you say "If he did that"
then I have to say "i would do this"
I think in other languages the way you say those things is more along the lines of "if he would do that"
if he did that, i would do this
yeah, that could be one possible ending to that sentence
yeah that's true, that's exactly russian language
interesting
"if he would do that"
ÐµÑÐ»Ð¸ Ð±Ñ‹ Ð¾Ð½ ÑÐ´ÐµÐ»Ð°Ð» ÑÑ‚Ð¾
as I thought
sadly, it's not correct in english, although people will probably still understand what you mean
of course, you know this rule already
but sometimes I hear people say that, and it just bothers me
that's just a rule people have to learn to make these sentences correctly
yeah, one more rule to go with the mountain of other ones
true
like "if i were"
but not "if i was"
yes, exactly like that
also a rule to learn
there are some cases where "If I was" is correctly, but it's a sticky topic
I suspect native speakers get them confused too
I need to look that up LUL
anyways, I think it's late in russia, so it is probably time for me to end
yeah, 11 pm
I enjoyed the stream today, and there was even some good gameplay (although mostly before you got here)
not too late for me, as i get to sleep on 2 am average
oh, ok
unhealthy
thought it was 12 where you were
but what can i do with my sleep schedule
yeah, it's hard
sleep is 99 difficulty
that's the reason why i sleep 5 hrs max
and always sleep deprived
I'm in the same boat
I'm hoping that we can both fix this problem at some point
a huge influence on my gaming actually
so my gaming days are mostly weekends
smart
and that's pretty much not good
did you clear any big stuff on a weekend?
like ds or ao stage?
because i want to tear these avoidances apart
ao stage i cleared on Tuesday
surprisingly
ao gaming Tuesday, fish gaming Wednesday
i still remember i wasnt feeling well so i skipped school
but since i started playing i was doing real gaming, no matter how i felt myself
surprisingly
that's interesting to me
i got many second drop attempts that day
very mysterious what causes good gameplay days
some of it is probably chance
and one of them suddenly turned out to be the clear
ds was even better
i was tired asf
sometimes that doesn't matter I guess
since i was playing ex piano for couple of hours that day
then i got to play ds that stream
thought like "nah, no gaming today"
4 minutes passed and the clear happened
absolutely destroyed Destruction State
with amazing gaming
first try three attacks
i still have vod
yeah, that's a special one
you can see it by yourself if you want
I'll take a look at it
actually 4-5 minutes of ds
that's in a description of my clear
anyways, I hope the same happens for tomo eventually
I'm done for today
and I'll be back in two days as usual
a funny moment happened in tomo today, I'll send you
well, thanks for the stream
I look forward to it
bye
bye!!
